document.title: The Hustle: A Guide to Going to College Without Paying For It!
document.abstract: This session will introduce students to scholarships, grants, and fellowship resources that will help them pay for school. It will show them examples of what the library has (books, websites) and how to find what they need. This session will also show them materials that will help them with personal statements and discuss some faculty members' insights about writing letters of recommendations.

field.name: location
field.value: Carolyn P. Brown Memorial University Center
